function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Address lifestyle changes, adapt to remote work/study, invest in technologies to combat covid-19","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Update leed standards to include indicators related to virus propagation prevention","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorporate waste management and mental health subcategories into leed standards","category":"Greenery","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integrate energy use and comfort indicators into leed standards","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Develop a comprehensive system with all necessary indicators of pandemic sustainability and integrate it into global gbc\\u0026rss.","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conduct a comparative analysis of gbc\\u0026rss’ pandemic response indicators and identify opportunities for cross-system collaboration and integration.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Expanding park capacity, creating additional green spaces, and enforcing social distancing regulations through park rangers or security personnel.","category":"Outdoor spaces","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote outdoor activities, create accessible green spaces, encourage social interaction in outdoor settings","category":"Social activities / facilitatie social interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote and incentivize regular visitation to ugs, offer programs to encourage ugs visitation","category":"Social activities / facilitatie social interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote outdoor activities in less crowded areas and emphasize physical distancing","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Promote and facilitate safe outdoor activities, encourage regular outdoor exercise, and create opportunities for social interaction in outdoor spaces","category":"Social activities / facilitatie social interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide alternative ways for respondents to connect with nature, , virtual tours or online resources","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Urban planning for post-pandemic public spaces","category":"Urban planning and green infrastructure development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cultural sensitivity in urban planning and design","category":"Urban planning and green infrastructure development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Cross-validation of results with multiple tools and manual verification of findings","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Anonymization of data, compliance with data protection regulations, secure data storage and access control","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct a comprehensive analysis of visitor demographics and behaviors in green areas","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conduct research to identify and understand the influence of socioeconomic attributes and environmental contexts on green space access","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing alternative outdoor spaces for socialization, promoting home-based exercise, and providing online mental health support","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Clear communication of lockdown guidelines, enforcement of social distancing rules, and community engagement to address concerns","category":"Social activities / facilitatie social interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Educating the public on relevant reporting and redirecting reports to appropriate channels for addressing crowded park incidents","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Equitable distribution of green areas, subsidization of transportation costs, and reduction of entrance or membership fees","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Community engagement and outreach programs, targeted educational initiatives, and inclusive urban design","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conducting research studies to gather quantitative data on the effectiveness of ubpi","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Developing tailored measurement tools for specific client presentations and theoretical backgrounds of psychological skills","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Combining self-reported data with other objective measures, and addressing biases through rigorous validation studies","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ensure proper training and supervision for pfa providers using the web platform","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide comprehensive training and support to ensure effective pfa delivery","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Offer comprehensive support, guidance, and resources to address student anxiety","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use secure platforms, educate clients about privacy risks","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Informed consent, additional follow-up sessions, training on phone communication","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement formal feedback mechanisms, collect data for quantitative analysis","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ensure relevant stakeholders are equipped with essential basic psychological skills for managing the impact of covid-19.","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Establish clear guidelines for confidentiality and risk management in online delivery of mental health services.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide oversight and review of the module contents by mental health professionals to ensure accuracy and suitability for public consumption.","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Include specific training on infectious disease prevention and control measures in the course","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integrate training on infection control measures within the built environment in the course","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Incorporate psychological support and stress management techniques in the training course","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementation of psychological interventions and support services to address psychological distress in the general population.","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation of psychological interventions, rapid adaptation skills training, and psychological first aid pfa for healthcare providers.","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conducting large scale quasi-experimental studies to validate the effectiveness of ubpi","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adopting progressive and dynamic approaches for emergency psychological crisis intervention services, forming expert groups to provide professional input","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing alternative delivery methods for psychological services, such as teletherapy and online public health and urban planning strategies.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"}]}
